      • isActionPressed

        public static boolean isActionPressed(org.newdawn.slick.Input in,
                                      java.lang.String func)
        Determines if the binding is pressed.
        Parameters:
        in - The current input.
        func - The binding to check.
        Returns:
        true if the binding is pressed, false otherwise.
